sentences.en: Any atlas , containing many pages of maps, normally includes an index, called a gazetteer.
sentences.cn: 任何载有多幅地图的地图集, 一般都附有一份地名索引.

sentences.en: Gazetteer Central America: Caribbean and Pacific drainages of southern Mexico and Central America.
sentences.cn: 中美洲: 墨西哥南部与中美洲的加勒比海与太平洋流域.

sentences.en: Gazetteer Eastern Central Pacific: Gulf of California to the Gulf of Chiriqui, Panama, and Cocos Island.
sentences.cn: 中太平洋东部: 加州湾到巴拿马的奇里基湾, 与可可岛.

sentences.en: Gazetteer South America: Amazon , Orinoco, and coastal river drainages of the Guianas.
sentences.cn: 南美洲: 圭亚那的亚马逊河, 奥里诺科河与海岸河流域.

sentences.en: Gazetteer South America: Amazon and Paran á River basins and coastal drainages in Guyana and Suriname.
sentences.cn: 南美洲: 在盖亚那与苏利南的亚马逊河与巴拉纳河流域与海岸的流域.

sentences.en: He commanded profound knowledge of astronomy, mathematics, Confucian classics, calendar calculation, geography, gazetteer, phonology and exegesis.
sentences.cn: 对天文 、 数学 、 经学 、 历算 、 地理 、 方志 、 音韵、训诂均有精深研究,为乾嘉时代皖派考据大师.

sentences.en: Then the cry of gazetteer hear from upstairs, so who sak: " What's wrong is this? "
sentences.cn: 这时记者听见从楼上传来的叫喊声,他问老人: “ 怎么了? ”
